verses.roman:
haridāsa ṭhākura kahena,--"āmi ki karimu?
niyama kariyāchi, tāhā kemane chāḍimu?"

synonyms: haridāsa ṭhākura—Haridāsa Ṭhākura; kahena—said; āmi ki karimu—what shall I do; niyama kariyāchi—I have made a vow; tāhā—that; kemane—how; chāḍimu—shall I give up.
translation: Haridāsa Ṭhākura said, "My dear friend, what ca I do? I have made a vow. How, then, can I give it up?"
